intro: Eusteralis stocksii, commonly known as the yellow stock, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features slender, upright stems and produces yellow to orange ray flowers that are typically 5-7 cm in length. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in wetlands and along stream banks. Eusteralis stocksii is an important plant for local biodiversity, providing nectar for native pollinators.
